daily_activities: Visit to the Museo Archeologico in Bolzano
Dining at a traditional Italian restaurant in Bolzano
Adventure sports in Lake Garda (paragliding or kayaking)
Sightseeing in Sirmione (Roman ruins and castle)
Shopping in Milan (Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II and Via Montenapoleone)
Visit to the Museo Poldi Pezzoli in Milan
Dining at a Michelin-starred restaurant in Milan
Sightseeing in Florence (Duomo and Uffizi Gallery)
Wine tasting in a local vineyard
Visit to the Vatican Museums in Rome
Sightseeing in Rome (Colosseum and Roman Forum)
Dining at a traditional trattoria in Rome

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: Approximately 10 hours and 30 minutes to 12 hours, depending on the flight route and layovers
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to one of Italy's major airports, such as Rome's Leonardo da Vinci–Fiumicino Airport (FCO) or Milan's Malpensa Airport (MXP), with possible layovers in cities like Dubai, Istanbul, or London
